header.note: The character "%" (out of a numerical context) is a meta-character that will be replaced (often by a numeric value) before the string is displayed
Text between less than (<) and greater than (>) symbols is a variable's name and must not be localised

trans-unit.source: The database or component "{db_name}" requires the component "{required_component_name}".
trans-unit.target: The database or component "{db_name}" requires the component "{required_component_name}".
trans-unit.note: Error while loading a compiled component.

trans-unit.source: The database or component "{db_name}" requires a method named "{required_method_name}" in the component "{required_component_name}".
trans-unit.target: The database or component "{db_name}" requires a method named "{required_method_name}" in the component "{required_component_name}".
trans-unit.note: Error while loading a compiled component.

trans-unit.source: The argument list for the method named "{required_method_name}" in the component "{required_component_name}" is incompatible with the database or component "{db_name}".
trans-unit.target: The argument list for the method named "{required_method_name}" in the component "{required_component_name}" is incompatible with the database or component "{db_name}".
trans-unit.note: Error while loading a compiled component.

trans-unit.source: Component "{db_name}" needs component "{required_component_name}" in order to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: Component "{db_name}" needs component "{required_component_name}" in order to be compiled.
trans-unit.note: Error while loading a compiled component.

trans-unit.source: Failed to allocate memory for compiled runtime information while loading database or component "{db_name}".
trans-unit.target: Failed to allocate memory for compiled runtime information while loading database or component "{db_name}".
trans-unit.note: Error while loading a compiled db.

trans-unit.source: Could not find compiled runtime information while loading database or component "{db_name}".
trans-unit.target: Could not find compiled runtime information while loading database or component "{db_name}".
trans-unit.note: Error while loading a compiled db.

trans-unit.source: The Unicode setting in "{db_name}" does not match the compiled runtime information.
trans-unit.target: The Unicode setting in "{db_name}" does not match the compiled runtime information.
trans-unit.note: Internal Error while loading a compiled db.

trans-unit.source: The arguments sent by the "{db_name}" database or component to the "{required_method_name}" method of the "{required_component_name}" component are incompatible with the expected ones.
trans-unit.target: The arguments sent by the "{db_name}" database or component to the "{required_method_name}" method of the "{required_component_name}" component are incompatible with the expected ones.

trans-unit.source: The database or component "{db_name}" needs to be recompiled.
trans-unit.target: The database or component "{db_name}" needs to be recompiled.

trans-unit.source: Cannot load uncompiled component "{db_name}" because the host has been opened in compiled mode.
trans-unit.target: Cannot load uncompiled component "{db_name}" because the host has been opened in compiled mode.

trans-unit.source: Duplicate component "{db_name}" in the 'Components' folder.
trans-unit.target: Duplicate component "{db_name}" in the 'Components' folder.

trans-unit.source: The executable could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: The executable could not be loaded.

trans-unit.target: Not enough privileges.
